nodes.documentation:
@title BreakInvariantBounty
@dev This bounty will pay out to a researcher if they break invariant logic of the contract.
nodes.name: BreakInvariantBounty

nodes.documentation: @dev Fallback function allowing the contract to receive funds, if they haven't already been claimed.

@dev Determine if the bounty was claimed.
@return true if the bounty was claimed, false otherwise.
nodes.name: claimed
createTarget

nodes.documentation:
@dev Transfers the contract funds to the researcher that proved the contract is broken.
@param target contract
nodes.name: claim

nodes.documentation: @dev Transfers the current balance to the owner and terminates the contract.
nodes.name: destroy

nodes.documentation:
@dev Internal function to deploy the target contract.
@return A target contract address
nodes.name: _deployContract

nodes.documentation:
@title Target
@dev Your main contract should inherit from this class and implement the checkInvariant method.
nodes.name: Target
checkInvariant
